ygData.subject: RE: Sorri
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey tat s INCORRECT.  U only see now I solo Treant with ease but did u see my hardship when I try to solo them at lvl 29-30?  U never know how many times I
ygData.messageBody:
Hey tat's INCORRECT. U only see now I solo Treant with ease but did u see
my hardship when I try to solo them at lvl 29-30? U never know how many
times I died ;) Furthermore, these are only 'physical' pain on my char,
the real pain is been KOS in Qeynos regions...u know how many Qeynos quests
I need to give up? ;)

Anyway 70% of the Treants (whether green or blue) still give me xp. Of coz
it wont be as good as other lvl 30 mobs but at least it give me safe and
steady (low) xp...better than get killed 3 times in a row and lost a week
efforts and time, hehe.

Ziltus


On Tuesday, 28 September, 1999 11:07 PM, Tommy Fong
[SMTP:tommyfong@...] wrote:
> From: "Tommy Fong" <tommyfong@...>
>
> On Tue, 28 Sep 1999 09:34:35 +0800, LKW wrote:
>
> >No pain no gain, no gain no glory.
> >Ziltus.
>
> That statement sux big time! u r the one who dun wanna get the PAIN!
Killing all the
> poor treants till u can't get a tiny drop of xp outta their ass, man!
;P
>
>
> Good Hunting,
>
> FlyingFox Everest, Magician at his 34
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
